subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Simeon Varlamov is 20, does not speak English and has played only eight games in the N.H.L, including a 33-save shutout Monday in a 4-0 victory over the Rangers.
snippet: Simeon Varlamov is 20, does not speak English and has played only eight games in the N.H.L, including a 33-save shutout Monday in a 4-0 victory over the Rangers.
